abstract: As fears of further bank failures continue to rock the markets, Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has told one of its units to stop insuring bank deposits above the amount guaranteed by the U.S. federal government, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: As fears of further bank failures continue to rock the markets, Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has told one of its units to stop insuring bank deposits above the amount guaranteed by the U.S. federal government, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Buffett Orders Unit to Rein in Bank Insurance, Report Says
